The claim was fact: checked by PolitiFact, who found it to be a combination of fabrication and unsupported speculation.
Government reviews of the Benghazi attac: as well as contemporaneous media reports and video footage, do not support the claim that Stevens was tortured and raped.
Various blog posts and a reverse: image search show that the photo used in the claim has been circulating on the internet since at least 2008, four years before Stevens' death.
